original_title: America's Atomic Bomb Tests: At Ground Zero
overview: The atomic bomb was brought to 'America's doorstep' during nuclear tests conducted in the Nevada desert in the 1950s. "At Ground Zero" contains the first ever compilation of the full length official documentaries that chronicle the effects of these tests as the full fury of a nuclear bomb is demonstrated on the typical American home.
title: America's Atomic Bomb Tests: At Ground Zero
